data.name: Kitsune Battlemage Demo
data.detailed_description: Alpha demo for Kitsune Battlemage, the elemental combat battle mage game. 1v1 multiplayer battles on a fairly small map with 3 rounds 6 minutes long, first to 3  wins the round, best of 3 wins the match. Some abilities are not available for the demo, choose any skill from 3 elements, and get creative in countering your opponents!
data.about_the_game: Alpha demo for Kitsune Battlemage, the elemental combat battle mage game. 1v1 multiplayer battles on a fairly small map with 3 rounds 6 minutes long, first to 3  wins the round, best of 3 wins the match. Some abilities are not available for the demo, choose any skill from 3 elements, and get creative in countering your opponents!
